document.full_text: top seed caroline wozniacki of denmark and 15th-seeded frenchwoman marion bartoli advanced smoothly to the final of the indian wells wta tournament with commanding victories on friday.
document.title: wozniacki and bartoli reach indian wells final
lines_and_colors: top seed caroline wozniacki of denmark and 15th-seeded frenchwoman marion bartoli advanced smoothly to the final of the indian wells wta tournament with commanding victories on friday.
